snippet.title: RAD - Pre-Order Announcement Trailer | PS4, X1, NSW, PC
snippet.description:
We're holding out for a hero! Grab that sweet bat and help save the world…or what’s remaining of it in RAD. 

Pre-Order RAD today to get extra rewards: https://bandainam.co/RAD

#RAD #DoubleFine #BandaiNamco

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
